main.name: JOSEPHINE BONKA

main.bio: Hi there! I am BONKA JOSEPHINE! . I've been coding for over 2. I’m a passionate React Developer . I always try to grab the new features of technology. I started my coding journey 2019 December and learned a lot of new technologies. I was dedicated to giving my full effort for completing my projects and I have completed them.

resume.skillmessage: My Programming Language  Proficiency AND frameworks

work.title: Student
work.description: Am working as a Chief Finace Officer at ALFAGIRI INNOVATIONS.

testimonials.text: JOSEPHINE BONKA is the team leader type of person, she's always coming up with several ideas when it comes to tackling problems, maybe one too many ideas haha, she is always up to thinking outside the box that sometimes he may not see the answer right infront of her, but that's okay! This is a clear sign of a lady who's passionate about what she does, a man who is curious about anything and everything, a lady who doesn't quit until she succeeds. A hardworker by the definition, Bonka Josephine is a joy to work with, sometimes she might need someone to step on the brakes, but most people need someone to step on the gas, and I'd say having too much speed in your field has very little cons and way too many pros.

JOSEPHINE BONKA is really good at coding. She is one of the best at applying her knowledge to solve problems and always comes up with a good solution. she is really confident and passionate about what she does, which is seen through her work. With her never give up attitude, she always gets things done.josephine Bonka is also someone who takes charge of things and is willing to be the one to lead the group. It was really fun working with her and the work always goes smoothly when she’s on the team.!
